    #include<stdio.h>
    #include<iostream>
    #include<stdlib.h>
    #include<vector>
    #include<queue>
    #include<algorithm>
    #include<math.h>
    #include<stack>
    #include<string.h>
    #define STOP system("pause")
    #define CASE int t;scanf("%d",&t);while(t--)
    #define LLI long long int
    #define LLU unsigned long long
    #define MAX(a,b) a>b?a:b
    #define MIN(a,b) a<b?a:b
    using namespace std;
    int main()
    { CASE
    {
    LLI sum=0,flag=0,a[100005],i,j,n;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {scanf("%lld",&a[i]);sum+=a[i];}
    sort(a,a+n);
    i=0;
    while(a[i]==0)
    i++;
    if(sum==0||n<=1)
    printf("YES\n");
    else
    {
    if(a[i]==1)
    {
    LLU sum1=1;
    for(j=i+1;j<n;j++)
    {
    if(a[j]<=(sum1+1))
    sum1+=a[j];
    else
    {flag++;j=n;}
    }
    if(flag)
    printf("NO\n");
    else
    printf("YES\n");
    }
    else
    printf("NO\n");
    }
    }
    return 0;
    }
